operations.summary: Retrieves the list of DVR stores associated with this application instance
operations.notes: This API is available in builds 15942 or later.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action which should be performed by the server

parameters.name: dvrConverterDefaultFileDestination
parameters.description: The file location to use when converting a nDVR store, the default is configured as the StorageDir in the application in use

parameters.name: dvrConverterDebugConversions
parameters.description: Indicates if the conversion should have debugging enabled, can be true or false, default is false

parameters.name: dvrConverterContinueOnSourceErrors
parameters.description: Indicates if the conversion should continue even if errors are detected, can be true or false, default is true

parameters.name: dvrConverterAudioVideoSyncEnable
parameters.description: Indicates if the audio/video offset should be detected and conversion only started after the sync in no longer detected or over default allowable time. Can be true or false, default is false

parameters.name: dvrConverterAudioVideoMaxOffset
parameters.description: Indicates the maximum audio/video timecodes can be out of sync

parameters.name: dvrConverterAudioVideoMaxBuffer
parameters.description: Indicates the maximum time a correct audio/video sync will be searched for before giving up

parameters.name: dvrConverterStartTime
parameters.description: A start time in UTC from where the conversion should start in the store, default is the first entry in the store

parameters.name: dvrConverterEndTime
parameters.description: A end time in UTC  where the conversion should end in the store, default is to the end of the store

parameters.name: dvrConverterDuration
parameters.description: A duration for the conversion either added to the start or subtracted from the end time, if you use duration you can not use start and end

parameters.name: dvrConverterOutputFilename
parameters.description: Indicates the output filename if not using the default, which is the name of the store being converted

parameters.name: dvrConverterStoreList
parameters.description: The comma-separated list of stores to convert

parameters.name: vhostName
parameters.description: The name of the current VHost the action will be performed on

parameters.name: appName
parameters.description: The application name needed for this REST call

parameters.name: instanceName
parameters.description: The application instance name needed for this REST call
